CommandHelpMessage.description: Displayed in the Plugin Installer as the description for the /pseas command.

TimeDay.description: A time of day. Displayed in the Schedules section, and on a tooltip in the overlay.

TimeSunset.description: A time of day. Displayed in the Schedules section, and on a tooltip in the overlay.

TimeNight.description: A time of day. Displayed in the Schedules section, and on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeShark.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeJellyfish.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeCrab.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeFugu.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeSquid.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeShrimp.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

VoyageMissionTypeShellfish.description: A type of fish, used in voyage missions. Displayed on a tooltip in the overlay.

ZoneText.description: Displayed in the overlay, to the right of the zone name. The input is a number between 1 and 3.

ZoneHoverText.message: Kliknij aby zobaczyć inne strefy. Informacje o pogodzie (i w tym sugerowane ryby) mogą być niedokładne.
ZoneHoverText.description: Displayed in the overlay, when hovering over the current zone.

OverlayIntTime.message: Ta ryba potrzebuje intuicji żeby ją złapać. Efekt intuicji trwa {0} sekund.

OverlayTooltipBiteTime.description: Displayed in a tooltip in the overlay.

OverlayTooltipBitePower.description: Displayed in a tooltip in the overlay.

OverlayTooltipStars.description: Displayed in a tooltip in the overlay.

OverlayTooltipVoyageMissionType.description: Displayed in a tooltip in the overlay.

OverlayTooltipBaitSwitch.message: Kliknij aby zmienić na tą przynęte.
OverlayTooltipBaitSwitch.description: Displayed in a tooltip in the overlay.

AboutSection.description: The name of a section, displayed on the left sidebar of the main window.

AboutSectionButtonGitHub.description: Displayed on a clickable button at the bottom of the About tab.

AboutSectionButtonDonate.description: Displayed on a clickable button at the bottom of the About tab.

AboutSectionDescriptionStart.message: Distant Seas nie mógłby być zrealizowany bez tych ludzi:

AboutSectionPohky.message: Pohky, za pomoc w inżynierii wstecznej Wedkarstwa Oceanowej
AboutSectionPohky.description: Displayed in a bullet point in the About tab.

AboutSectionTyoto.message: Tyo'to Tayuun, za ich arkusz Wędkarstwa Oceanowej
AboutSectionTyoto.description: Displayed in a bullet point in the About tab.

AboutSectionPillowfication.message: pillowfication, za ich stronę Wędkarstwa Oceanowej
AboutSectionPillowfication.description: Displayed in a bullet point in the About tab.

AboutSectionFishcord.message: Członkowie serwera Discord Fisherman's Horizon, za ich wędkarską mądrość
AboutSectionFishcord.description: Displayed in a bullet point in the About tab.

AboutSectionGoatPlace.message: Członkowie serwera XIVLauncher & Dalamud Discord, za ich mądrość programistyczną
AboutSectionGoatPlace.description: Displayed in a bullet point in the About tab.

AboutSectionTranslators.message: Specjalne podziękowania dla tych wspaniałych tłumaczy:
AboutSectionTranslators.description: Displayed in a bullet point in the About tab.

JournalSection.description: Displayed in the Journal section, most likely on a button or table header.

JournalActive.message: Bieżąca łódź jest aktywnie śledzona w dzienniku.
JournalActive.description: Displayed at the top of the Journal section.

JournalEnabled.message: Dziennik jest włączony, ale obecnie nie jest śledzona żadna łódź.
JournalEnabled.description: Displayed at the top of the Journal section.

JournalDisabled.description: Displayed at the top of the Journal section.

JournalSectionButtons.description: Displayed in the Journal section, most likely on a button or table header.

JournalSectionButtonDelete.description: Displayed in the Journal section, most likely on a button or table header.

JournalSectionButtonDeleteTooltip.message: Tego nie można cofnąć. Przytrzymaj Control, aby włączyć ten przycisk.

ProgressSection.description: Displayed in the Progress section, most likely on a table header.

ProgressSectionHeadsUp.message: Wygląda źle? Otwórz menu Osiągnięcia, aby zsynchronizować stan ukończenia, i wybierz Na łodzi V, aby zsynchronizować łączną liczbę punktów.

SchedulesSectionDate.description: Displayed in the Schedules section, most likely on a table header.

RelativeDatePast.description: Displayed in the Schedules section, representing a relative date. The input is a number.

SettingsSection.description: The name of a section, displayed on the left sidebar of the main window.

SettingsShowOverlay.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsShowOverlayDescription.message: Kiedy w Wedkarstwie Oceanowej, pokazuje nadkładkę z informacją o obecnej łodzi.
SettingsShowOverlayDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsAlarmEnabled.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsAlarmEnabledDescription.message: Publikuje wiadomość na czacie (i opcjonalnie odtwarza dźwięk) przed następną łodzią.
SettingsAlarmEnabledDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsJournalEnabled.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsJournalEnabledDescription.message: Zapisuje dziennik każdej łodzi, na której się znajdujesz. Wyłączenie tej opcji nie spowoduje usunięcia starych dzienników.
SettingsJournalEnabledDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsOceanFishingBaitsOnly.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsOceanFishingBaitsOnlyDescription.message: Preferuje Ragworm, Krill i Plump Worm jako przynęty, kiedy możliwe.
SettingsOceanFishingBaitsOnlyDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsPreferDynamicSuggestions.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsPreferDynamicSuggestionsDescript.message: Używaj przynęty o jak najmniejszym nakładaniu się czasu ugryzienia zamiast przynęt zdefiniowanych przez społeczność. Prawdopodobnie będzie mniej dokładny.
SettingsPreferDynamicSuggestionsDescript.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsLockOverlay.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsHideVanillaOverlay.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsHideVanillaOverlayDescription.message: Ukrywa dziennik połowów i misje podróży z gry podstawowej.
SettingsHideVanillaOverlayDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsScrollFish.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsSortFish.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsSortFishDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsDrawVoyageMissions.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsHideFinishedMissions.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsDrawFishNames.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsDrawFishRanges.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsDrawIntTimes.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsDrawIntTimesDescription.message: W przypadku ryb, które wymagają intuicji do złowienia, obok ich ikon wyświetlany jest czas trwania intuicji.
SettingsDrawIntTimesDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsDrawFishPoints.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsDrawFishPointsDescription.message: Pokazuje maksymalną liczbę punktów, które można uzyskać z każdej ryby. Jest to obliczane przez pomnożenie maksymalnej wydajności ryb przez średnią punktów.
SettingsDrawFishPointsDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsDrawSpectralColors.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsDrawSpectralColorsDescription.message: Wizualnie zaznacz, że znajdujesz się w prądzie widmowym, zmieniając kolor tła na niebieski.
SettingsDrawSpectralColorsDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

SettingsAlarmMinutes.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsAlarmSoundEnabled.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsAlarmSound.description: Displayed in the Settings tab - most likely a label accompanied by a configurable option.

SettingsAlarmSoundDescription.message: Dźwięk odtwarzany po uruchomieniu alarmu. To jest to samo, co dźwięk <se.X> na czacie.
SettingsAlarmSoundDescription.description: Displayed in the Settings tab, as a help label next to a configurable option.

AlarmMessage.description: Displayed in the chat window when the alarm goes off.
